library

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • library.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    Library class is the terminal class. All operations about the working system of the library are performed in this class. All controls are also done in this class. It is connected with all other classes about library.
    Author:
    Hazar
    See Also:
    Student, Academic, LibraryMember, Book, Printed, Handwritten

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private books.Book book
      The Book instance which will added to the library system, which is the bookList.
      private books.Book[] bookList
      The Book Array which will store all books in the library system in an orderly way
      private int bookNum
      The total number of the books in the library system.
      private librarymembers.LibraryMember libraryMember
      The Library Member instance which will added to the library system which is the libraryMemberList.
      private librarymembers.LibraryMember[] libraryMemberList
      The LibraryMember Array which will store all members in the library system in an orderly way.
      private int memberNum
      The total number of the members in the library system.
      (package private) java.util.Scanner scanner
      The Scanner which will take input from file or user.
      private int totalFee
      The amount of the total fee that is paid to the library.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Library

        public Library(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Construct this library with a scanner parameter. Assigns the parameter scanner to the field one. Identifies the bookList[] and libraryMemberList[] arrays.
        Parameters:
        scanner - The scanner which reads input.

    • Method Detail

      • getBooks

        public books.Book[] getBooks()
        Returns list of the books contained in the library
        Returns:
        bookList Array.

      • getMembers

        public librarymembers.LibraryMember[] getMembers()
        Returns list of the members contained in the library
        Returns:
        memberList Array.

      • getTotalFee

        public int getTotalFee()
        Returns the amount of total fee that is paid to the library.
        Returns:
        totalFee fields value.

      • addBook

        public void addBook()
        Adds book to the library system. Creates a Book object and adds to bookList array. Assigns a bookID to the book.

      • addMember

        public void addMember()
        Adds member to the library system. Creates a LibraryMember object and adds to libraryMemberList array. Assigns a memberID to the book.

      • borrowBook

        public void borrowBook(int tick)
        Performs borrowing book action. Checks the requirements for borrowing by calling isValidBorrow method. Calls the borrowBook method to complete borrowing.
        Parameters:
        tick - The value which determines time.

      • isValidBorrow

        private boolean isValidBorrow(librarymembers.LibraryMember libraryMember,
                              int bookID,
                              int tick)
        Controls whether the given book is valid to be borrowed or not.
        Parameters:
        libraryMember - The member who want to borrow book.
        bookID - The ID value of the book which will be borrowed.
        tick - The value which determines time.
        Returns:
        True if the book is valid to be borrowed by member; otherwise, false.

      • returnBook

        public void returnBook(int tick)
        Carry out returning book process. Reads input with scanner from input and gets the information about book and member which will perform returning action. Checks the requirements for returning by calling isValidReturn method.
        Parameters:
        tick - The value which determines time.

      • isValidReturn

        private boolean isValidReturn(int bookID,
                              int memberID)
        Controls whether the given book is valid to be returned or not.
        Parameters:
        bookID - The ID value of the book which will be returned.
        memberID - The ID value of the member which will return book.
        Returns:
        True if the book is valid to be returned by member; otherwise, false.

      • returnBook

        private void returnBook(int bookID,
                        librarymembers.LibraryMember libraryMember,
                        int tick)
        Performs the actual returning action. Calls returnBook method to do that.
        Parameters:
        bookID - The ID value of the book which will be returned.
        libraryMember - The LibraryMember which wanted to return book.
        tick - The value which determines time.

      • extendBook

        public void extendBook(int tick)
        Performs extending action. Checks requirements of the extending process with isExtendable method. If it is valid for the action, extends deadline of the book regarding to time limit of the member.
        Parameters:
        tick - The value which determines time.

      • isExtendable

        private boolean isExtendable(books.Book book,
                             int memberID,
                             int tick)
        Controls whether the given book is valid to be extended or not.
        Parameters:
        book - The Book object which will be controlled whether it is able to be extended or not.
        memberID - The ID value of the member which will extend book.
        tick - The value which determines time.
        Returns:
        True if the book is valid to be extended by member; otherwise, false.

      • readInLibrary

        public void readInLibrary()
        Performs reading in the library action. Controls first whether the member is able to read that specific book or that book is able to be read in the library. Calls readBook method to perform reading action.

      • control

        public void control()
